logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "Started get covid case by national id flow"

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (covidCase, indexOfCovidCase) -> { caseID: covidCase.case_id, source: covidCase.source, caseType: covidCase.case_type, firstName: covidCase.first_name, lastName: covidCase.last_name, phone: covidCase.phone, email: covidCase.email, dateOfBirth: covidCase.date_of_birth as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"}, nationalID: covidCase.national_id, nationalIDType: covidCase.national_id_type, address: { streetAddress: covidCase.street_address, city: covidCase.city, state: covidCase.state, postal: covidCase.postal, country: covidCase.country }, createDate: covidCase.create_date as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"}, updateDate: covidCase.update_date as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "code": 404, "message": "Resource not found", "description": "The server has not found anything matching the Request-URI", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "transactionId": vars.transactionId }

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: Completed get covid case by national id flow, payload: #[payload]"
